stories.text: Has anyone done any HR employee (HCM/HRIS) directory integration with Keycloak. Any HR employee directories that integrate better than others? A one way sync of the directory should be good enough. Perhaps later on a two-way directory integration might be necessary but I can't think of a reason for it.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to do HR (HCM) employee directory integration with Keycloak?
The radical idea that people have value (2018)
Decentralized and Collaborative AI on Blockchain (2019)

stories.text: I value an accreditation I received as a sworn software engineer. How can I stop bad behavior by a principal without impacting the accreditation, which I'm proud of and is one of the only acknowledgments I've gotten in life? The behavior I would like to stop is modification of correspondence records which is an issue I noticed today that bothered me immensely.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to stop bad behavior without impacting accreditation
